titles.title: A bill for the relief of Hyong Cha Kim Kay.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 2/16/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the granting of a visa and admission to the United States for temporary residence to a named individual. Authorizes the adjustment of such individual's status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence provided certain conditions are met.
